remarks: Property of a lattice plane expressed as the join of 3 atoms. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jul-2012.)
statement:
lplnri1.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
lplnri1.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
lplnri1.p $e |- P = ( LPlanes ` K ) $.
lplnri1.y $e |- Y = ( ( Q .\/ R ) .\/ S ) $.
lplnri1 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( Q e. A /\ R e. A /\ S e. A ) /\ Y e. P ) -> Q =/= R ) $.
